content.prompt: Which of the following best describes how an increase in the concentration of substrate in the reaction mixture affected the frequency of enzymeâ€‘substrate interactions?

choices.label: The frequency of enzyme-substrate interactions decreased over all substrate concentrations.
The frequency of enzyme-substrate interactions increased exponentially over all substrate concentrations.
The frequency of enzyme-substrate interactions increased until all of the active sites were interacting with substrate.
The frequency of enzyme-substrate interactions increased until all of the enzyme was depleted.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
